CustomField.description: Adds 30 days to the Last Allocation Schedule Enacted Date if populated. Otherwise, adds 30 days to Actual PTO Date or 3 months to the Estimated PTO Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Adds 30 days to the Last Allocation Schedule Enacted Date if populated. Otherwise, adds 30 days to Actual PTO Date or 3 months to the Estimated PTO Date.
CustomField.label: Est Utility NMC to Customer Date
